name: bar-booking-system
description: Bar Table Booking System - Microservices with Spring Boot and Next.js

scripts.start: node -e "console.log('Use npm run start:all or individual service commands')"
scripts.start:all: npm run infra && npm run backend && npm run frontend
scripts.start:infra: docker-compose -f deploy/docker-compose.yaml up -d mysql rabbitmq redis
scripts.start:backend: npm run start:user & npm run start:table & npm run start:booking & npm run start:checkin & npm run start:payment & npm run start:gateway
scripts.stop:all: npm run stop:backend && npm run stop:frontend && npm run stop:infra
scripts.stop:backend: echo 'Manually stop backend services in their terminals (Ctrl+C)'
scripts.stop:frontend: echo 'Manually stop frontend in its terminal (Ctrl+C)'
scripts.db:reset: node -e "console.log('Run: docker exec bar-booking-mysql mysql -uroot -proot -e \"DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS user_db; CREATE DATABASE user_db;\"')"
scripts.help:
node -e "console.log('
Available commands:
  start:infra - Start Docker containers
  start:user - Start User Service
  start:table - Start Table Service
  start:booking - Start Booking Service
  start:checkin - Start Check-in Service
  start:payment - Start Payment Service
  start:gateway - Start API Gateway
  start:frontend - Start Frontend
  stop:infra - Stop Docker containers
  logs:infra - View all infrastructure logs
  docker:ps - Check container status
')"

author: Friyen Team
